instructions: This is the public broadcast feed for CloudOS. Push updates to this file to broadcast to all CloudOS users. Messages are fetched via raw.githubusercontent.com.

messages.text: Welcome to the CloudOS Broadcast Network! This feed is hosted on GitHub and fetched live by every CloudOS instance. Post a message locally, export it, and push to this repo to broadcast to everyone.

How it works:
1. Write a message in the Broadcast app
2. Click Export to download feed.json
3. Push feed.json to broadcasts/ in the repo
4. Everyone who clicks 'Fetch Live Feed' sees your message!
Share your apps via CloudStore, chat on Broadcast, play cartridge games in the Arcade. All powered by public GitHub raw URLs. No servers, no accounts, no APIs.
